results.author: Helmut Sdjasdna
results.Content: The biggest room in the world is room for improvement.

results.author: Albert Einstein
results.Content: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.

results.author: Maya Angelou
results.Content: Do the best you can until you know better. Then when you know better, do better.

results.author: Winston Churchill
results.Content: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.

results.author: Thomas Edison
results.Content: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.

results.author: Socrates
results.Content: The unexamined life is not worth living.

results.author: Michael Jordan
results.Content: I've missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. 26 times, I've been trusted to take the game-winning shot and missed. Iâ€™ve failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.

results.author: Dalai Lama
results.Content: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.

results.author: Nelson Mandela
results.Content: Do not judge me by my successes, judge me by how many times I fell down and got back up again.

results.author: Confucius
results.Content: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

results.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
results.Content: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

results.author: Babe Ruth
results.Content: It's hard to beat a person who never gives up.
